post_title: Looking to trade: SLers with P350 backs for OMSL backs
post_content:
Hi All. 

Nothing to trade for now!

Scans added for 8 of my Piedmont 350s. I will add the rest when I receive them. 

The Otey/Lentz are likely trimmed (which is what I was told when I bought them, I don't have the flips to confirm they were graded As)

The Greminger was purchased in a lot of 10+ SLers, and there was no note that it was trimmed. It is obviously an excellent copy with exceptional eye appeal

Scans have been added, so everything should be there now.

While you will see Lentz and Westlake cards fairly regularly, I also have a bunch of tougher cards now listed in Lafitte, Reagan and Howard, who do not pop up as frequently.

As a reminder, I am looking to swap these cards for the same front with an OMSL back, or to trade them for SLers I don't have at all with an OMSL back. 

Thanks to Jeff for an awesome trade to jumpstart this project. If you are interested in anything posted, please PM me.
bump for all the traders out there

I have Molly, if interested;
shoot me a PM

lets bump this one. looking for trades.
Was able to pick up a Bay with OMSL back, so one step closer now. At 29/48 OMSLs. My want list above for trades is updated

I was able to pick up a Thornton and Molly Miller with OMSL backs, so getting closer. Still looking for trades or to buy lower grade copies of the cards I don't have if you aren't interested in trading. 

Thanks as always for checking out the thread.

Getting close to finishing the OMSL run. 

I have moved 4 cards from the trade pile over to my for sale thread. I will still trade those for a SLer with an OMSL back, so if you are interested, now is the time. 

Also looking to buy a lower grade copy of one of the above mentioned cards that I am still searching for. If you have one, drop me a line.
